User.title: User
User.description: Represents a system user who can log into the application (e.g., Admin, Operations, Moderator, Courier).

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

email.description: The user's email address, used for login.

fullName.description: The full name of the user.

phoneNumber.description: The contact phone number for the user.

roleId.description: Reference to the Role assigned to this user. (Relationship: Role 1:N User)

isActive.description: Indicates whether the user account is active or disabled.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Defines a specific system role (e.g., Admin, Operations, Moderator, Courier) with a set of associated permissions.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Role entity.

description.description: A description of the role's responsibilities and capabilities.

permissionIds.description: References to Permissions assigned to this role. (Relationship: Role N:N Permission)

Permission.title: Permission
Permission.description: Represents a specific granular permission within the system that can be assigned to roles.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Permission entity.

name.description: The programmatic name of the permission (e.g., 'manage_users', 'create_order').

description.description: A clear description of what this permission allows.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Represents a customer who places an order in the market.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Customer entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the customer.

lastName.description: The last name of the customer.

email.description: The email address of the customer (optional).

phoneNumber.description: The primary contact phone number for the customer.

address.description: The primary street address of the customer.

city.description: The city where the customer resides.

state.description: The state or region where the customer resides (optional).

zipCode.description: The postal code for the customer's address (optional).

zoning.description: The geographical zoning associated with the customer's location.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the customer record was created.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product available for sale in the market.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Product entity.

description.description: A detailed description of the product (optional).

price.description: The current selling price of the product.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit, a unique identifier for the product (optional).

isActive.description: Indicates whether the product is currently available for sale.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the product record was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the product record was last updated.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a single sales order placed by a customer, including details about products, status, and associated personnel.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Order entity.

customerId.description: Reference to the Customer who placed this order. (Relationship: Customer 1:N Order)

moderatorId.description: Reference to the User (with 'Moderator' role) who managed this order. (Relationship: User 1:N Order)

courierId.description: Reference to the User (with 'Courier' role) assigned to deliver this order (optional). (Relationship: User 1:N Order)

orderDate.description: The date and time when the order was placed or created.

status.description: The current status of the order (e.g., 'Pending', 'Confirmed', 'Shipped', 'Delivered', 'Returned', 'No Answer', 'Cancelled').

totalAmount.description: The calculated total amount of the order, including products, shipping, and taxes.

shippingAddress.description: The full street address for shipping the order.

shippingCity.description: The city for shipping the order.

shippingZoning.description: The geographical zoning specific to this order's delivery location.

isLocked.description: Indicates if the order's core details are locked after creation, preventing most edits.

notes.description: General notes or comments related to the order (optional).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the order record was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the order record was last updated.

OrderItem.title: OrderItem
OrderItem.description: Represents a specific product item included as a line item within an order.

id.description: Unique identifier for the OrderItem entity.

orderId.description: Reference to the Order this item belongs to. (Relationship: Order 1:N OrderItem)

productId.description: Reference to the Product being ordered. (Relationship: Product 1:N OrderItem)

quantity.description: The quantity of the product ordered.

unitPrice.description: The price of a single unit of the product at the time of order.

subtotal.description: The calculated subtotal for this order item (quantity * unitPrice).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the order item was created.

CommissionRule.title: CommissionRule
CommissionRule.description: Defines the rules for calculating commissions based on various criteria, such as order type or user performance.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CommissionRule entity.

name.description: A descriptive name for the commission rule (e.g., 'Standard Moderator Commission').

description.description: A detailed description of how this commission rule works.

type.description: The type of commission (e.g., 'booking' for order creation, 'delivery' for order delivery).

isGlobal.description: Indicates if this rule applies globally to all relevant users or is user-specific.

applicableUserId.description: Reference to a specific User if the rule is not global (optional). (Relationship: User 1:N CommissionRule)

minOrderCount.description: The minimum number of orders required to qualify for this tiered commission (optional).

maxOrderCount.description: The maximum number of orders for which this tiered commission applies (optional).

commissionRate.description: The percentage rate of the commission (e.g., 0.05 for 5%) (optional).

fixedAmount.description: A fixed monetary amount for the commission (optional).

startDate.description: The date from which this commission rule becomes active.

endDate.description: The date when this commission rule ceases to be active (optional).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the commission rule was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the commission rule was last updated.

Commission.title: Commission
Commission.description: Represents a single calculated commission payment or record for a specific order and user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Commission entity.

orderId.description: Reference to the Order for which this commission was earned. (Relationship: Order 1:N Commission)

userId.description: Reference to the User (Moderator or Courier) who earned this commission. (Relationship: User 1:N Commission)

commissionRuleId.description: Reference to the CommissionRule that was applied to calculate this commission. (Relationship: CommissionRule 1:N Commission)

amount.description: The monetary amount of the commission earned.

calculationDate.description: The date and time when the commission was calculated.

status.description: The payment status of the commission (e.g., 'Calculated', 'Paid', 'Pending').

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the commission record was created.

MonthlyCommissionSummary.title: MonthlyCommissionSummary
MonthlyCommissionSummary.description: Aggregated monthly commission summary for each moderator, providing a breakdown of earnings.

id.description: Unique identifier for the MonthlyCommissionSummary entity.

moderatorId.description: Reference to the User (with 'Moderator' role) for whom this summary is generated. (Relationship: User 1:N MonthlyCommissionSummary)

month.description: The month (1-12) for which the summary is generated.

year.description: The year for which the summary is generated.

totalBookingCommissions.description: The total amount of booking commissions for the month.

totalDeliveryCommissions.description: The total amount of delivery commissions for the month.

totalCommissions.description: The total aggregated commissions (booking + delivery) for the month.

totalOrdersProcessed.description: The total number of orders processed by the moderator in the month.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the summary record was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the summary record was last updated.

OrderFollowUp.title: OrderFollowUp
OrderFollowUp.description: Tracks follow-up notes and actions for specific orders, particularly those with 'Returned' or 'No Answer' statuses.

id.description: Unique identifier for the OrderFollowUp entity.

orderId.description: Reference to the Order to which this follow-up note applies. (Relationship: Order 1:N OrderFollowUp)

userId.description: Reference to the User who made this follow-up note. (Relationship: User 1:N OrderFollowUp)

note.description: The content of the follow-up note.

followUpDate.description: The date and time when the follow-up action or note was recorded.

statusAfterFollowUp.description: The status of the order after this particular follow-up action (optional).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the follow-up record was created.
